name: prodigiously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is extremely great in ability, amount, or strength: He was a prodigiously gifted artist. Young children can learn prodigiously. See
prodigious
More examplesFewer examplesThey have a prodigiously talented staff.She is a prodigiously gifted writer.He wrote prodigiously for scholarly journals.
